name: Veggie Go Go!
description:
The witch's potion went wrong and you are now alive! Run from her!

Avoid Rock, Log and also her minions. You can attack her minion with your cabbage. After certain distance she might be able to catch you up fight her back to repel her!

A/left arrow - move left

D/right arrow - move right

space/left click - shoot cabbage

This project is for the Bangkok University GI344 class.

Supervised by 

-Ravisr Manomaivibul 

-Nonthi Sithikong

-Samitta Somwong

-Chayapol Khodkham
